item.title: Danny Jones Podcast Reels Editing - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for 2 or 3 editors to take our weekly podcast and cut 10 Youtube Shorts from it, finding the most interesting, mysterious sensational, or controversial topics you see in each show.

FOR NOW, THE JOB WILL BE FOR 2 SHORTS AS A TEST. We're looking for editors to do ongoing work.

Examples of past Youtube Shorts here:
https://www.youtube.com/@DannyJonesClips/shorts

You DON'T have to match the most recent Shorts production quality.

SHORTS REQUIREMENTS:
1) Youtube Shorts must be 1 minute
2) Must have English subtitles
3) Can include b-roll or filters
4) Have fun with it

For future reference, Podcasts are between 1.5 and 3.5 hours duration.

Cheers!

Hourly Range: $12.00-$24.00
Posted On: June 14, 2024 12:51 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Shorts, Instagram Reels, Media & Entertainment, Video Editing
Skills: YouTube Shorts, Instagram Reels, Media & Entertainment, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.description:
Editor needed for YouTube channel about the Global Economy.

- NO AGENCY'S, Only solo freelancers
- Video’s will be 20 minutes long
- A voice over and the script will be provided

2. Fast response time

item.title: Video Editor needed for both long form and short form fashion tutorials on Premiere Pro - Upwork
item.description:
Oveview:
- Fashion and sewing tutorials
- Ongoing work
- Edit raw footage into professional videos and YouTube content
- Repurpose long form videos into multiple short form videos for reels, TikToks and YouTube shorts
- Must use Adobe Premiere Pro
- Applicants also proficient in Adobe Illustrator will be prioritised.

I film fashion and sewing tutorials for both an online membership and YouTube channel.

The perfect candidate will be able to edit my raw footage into clear, professional videos for my audience and customers to follow along. I request the editing to be done inside Adobe Premiere Pro enabling me to work, add or edit the project if needed.

Repurposing the long form content into multiple short form videos is also required. Please visit my YouTube channel for examples of existing work: youtube.com/@digitalpatternlibrary

This is ongoing work and good communication is a must.

If the candidate is also proficient with Adobe Illustrator please let me know, as technical illustrations are also required and can be interpreted from the video footage. Please see attached instruction booklet as an example.


Posted On: June 14, 2024 12:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Illustrator, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Adobe Illustrator, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Real Estate Projects - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented Video Editor to join our team and work on Real Estate projects. As a Video Editor, you will be responsible for editing and compiling footage, applying special effects, and ensuring the final video is engaging and visually appealing. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of Real Estate concepts and be able to showcase properties in the best possible way through video editing.

    Responsibilities:
    - Edit and compile footage to create high-quality Real Estate videos
    - Apply special effects and enhance visuals to make the videos captivating. Specifically, Google Earth is used often.
    - Collaborate with the creative team to understand project requirements
    - Ensure video content aligns with brand guidelines and objectives

    Requirements:
    - Proven experience as a Video Editor, preferably in Real Estate projects
    - Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
    - Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
    - Knowledge of Real Estate concepts and ability to showcase properties effectively
    - Excellent communication and teamwork skills

    If you are passionate about video editing, have experience in Real Estate projects, and can produce high-quality videos, we would love to hear from you. Please provide your portfolio showcasing your previous work in Real Estate video editing.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 14, 2024 12:44 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Video Editor for Men's Grooming Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled YouTube video editor to join our team and help create engaging content for our men's grooming channel. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing raw footage into high-quality videos that align with our brand's style and aesthetic. The ideal candidate should have experience in editing beauty or lifestyle videos, with a strong understanding of YouTube trends and audience preferences. Attention to detail, creativity, and a keen eye for storytelling are essential qualities for this role.

Skills required:
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Ability to work with different video formats and codecs
- Strong knowledge of color grading and audio editing
- Familiarity with motion graphics and visual effects
- Excellent communication and organizational skills

Size: Medium
Duration: 1 to 3 months
Expertise: Intermediate

Budget: $40

item.title: FB Ads Performance Creative / Creative Strategist / Video Editor Needed for a Health/Wellness Brand - Upwork
item.description:
Hey Social Ad Pro!

We're a wellness/health ecommerce business looking for a bad-ass performance creative – someone who can create both create great ad concepts AND turn those concepts into compelling ads (video or static) that drive results – either by themselves entirely or with content from UGC creators.

You're a perfect fit, if:

– You can spot a good Meta ad when you see one and tell what specifically makes it good.

– You understand consumer psychology and can create ads that drive results and not only look great.

– You're comfortable overseeing the entire ad creation process (including coordinating content with creators), from conceptualisation to execution, with top-notch quality.

– Creativity runs through your veins, but you're also technical, able to navigate the intricacies of ad creation.

– You're adept at testing different ad concepts

What you can expect:

- Your ads will be tested on Meta Ads. We will share with you all the statistics (3s watch rate, click rate etc) so you can improve your game (not based on opinions, but based on real data)

- You'll be responsible for creating different ad concepts to identify what resonates best with our audience. From there, you'll iterate and optimize to drive maximum conversions.

- You will get some direction for ads, but we prioritise creativity and you bringing your own ideas 💡

- This is a dynamic role with access to budget for content creation as needed. You'll have the freedom to bring your creative vision to life, whether that means creating ads entirely on your own or collaborating UGC creators.

THE JOB:

- We're looking to start with around 5-7 hours a week. If it works out, we're looking to extend to a long-term contract with more hours.

- This job is creating (mostly video) ads for Meta–facebook, from conceptualising, coordinating with content creators (if needed); to delivering the final ad that's ready to launch.

Interested? Let's chat! An ideal application should include examples of ads you created and your reasoning of why you made them that way and what you think makes them good.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

–Augustas

Hourly Range: $30.00-$120.00
Posted On: June 14, 2024 12:38 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Facebook Advertising, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Performance Marketing, Direct Response Copywriting, Creative Strategy, Video Editing
Skills: Facebook Advertising, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Performance Marketing, Direct Response Copywriting, Creative Strategy, Video Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: YouTube SEO Channel Manager - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a part-time virtual assistant who is going to be in charge of my YouTube channel video uploads.

This is my channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/EranBucai

Your role is going to include the following:
Downloading an mp4 file once it's been edited by my video editor.
Do all the SEO requirements to research the best keywords before uploading the video (usually the videos are mostly set with regards to the name, since I give that information in advance)
Watch the video
Write an SEO optimized and helpful description
Create chapters for videos over 5 minutes
Add tags
Add 1 hashtag
Add cards to other videos and relevant CTAs within the video
Add end screens
Create a great thumbnail

You will be given access to my course on YouTube SEO as part of this, and templates of previous thumbnails I had done, photos of me for the thumbnail, etc.

I use a project management tool called "Blue.cc" and there is a whole process in place already.

My previous VA for this role has moved on and I am searching for someone new.

Note that this role is a FIXED PRICE of $5 per video.

There are currently over 20 videos backlogged to be uploaded to YouTube.

There is a sizable volume of videos.

Please only apply if you are okay with my salary proposal and have YouTube SEO and thumbnails experience.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Eran

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 14, 2024 12:26 UTC
Category: SEO
Skills:YouTube Marketing, Search Engine Optimization, SEO Keyword Research, Organic Traffic Growth, YouTube, Canva
Skills: YouTube Marketing, Search Engine Optimization, SEO Keyword Research, Organic Traffic Growth, YouTube, Canva
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Thumbnail Designer for New Youtube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hi! We're starting a new travel channel and are looking for a motivated thumbnail designer to help create eye-catching, high-CTR, and high-quality thumbnails for it.

We'll provide video titles and references, and you will create the thumbnail based on them. The channel requires 12-15 thumbnails per month.

This will be a very long term cooperation, you need to know how to use Trello to paste the completed thumbnails onto individual cards.

Here are the quality and references we're looking for:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cXriYwyZOVE
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mtHIlmmeM58
If you see this, reply in WOW

Please send us 3-5 works that you've done before(MUST)

We're looking forward to working with you!

Budget: $2,000
Posted On: June 14, 2024 12:23 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Photo Editing, Thumbnail, YouTube Marketing, Graphic Design, YouTube, Social Media Imagery, Logo Design, Image Editing, ChatGPT

The reel should be captivating and highlight the special moments of the event.
